name: pragmatist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who deals with problems in a sensible way that suits the conditions that really exist, rather than following fixed theories, ideas, or rules: She rose to power by being a political pragmatist who took advantage of every opportunity. Americans have a reputation for being political pragmatists, not ideologues. See
pragmatism
